page.title: 05Colonel Tingey - Background
page.content: Colonel Tingey was born in Worcestershire in 1924.His family has always been in the{Army.}He was continually moving from country to country. In childhood he attended private schooling in Germany,Malta,China and India between 1948 and 1952. When he left school,he joined the {Armed Forces (Royal Artillery Regiment).He was in the Army for 25 years during which time he visited India,Israel(then Palestine),Egypt,Libya,Germany and finally Kenya.He was also in Normandy for{D-Day.}When he returned home he went on a parachute course and then became{Lieutenant}in Liverpool.His daughters were at that time away at school at a private boarding school which he believes in strongly.
